TopicTitle: Good writeup on NERVA and the history of Nuke Rockets

Articles.Content:
http://www.txchnologist.com/2011/nuclear-space-rockets-and-the-most-fascinating-nasa-man-youve-never-heard-of

If you are interested in this, there is a great book about it. To the End of the Solar System by James Dewer. Very technical and dry but a TON of good info on the history and all the testing that the USA did.
Fun fact: SpaceX is looking into it
